Package main

Class UserInterface

java.lang.Object
main.UserInterface
public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
The UserInterface of our Farm Simulator. It contains all the methods necessary for interacting with the user via the command line.
Version:
1.0, May 2020.
Author:
Alina Phang

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor Description

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void chooseAnimal​(Farmer farmer)
    Asks the player to choose one of their animals to feed

    Asks the player to choose one of their crops to tend to

    Shows all the crops that are ready to harvest and asks the player to choose one to harvest

    • getChoice

      public static int getChoice​(int begin, int numChoices)
      A reusable method to take in the number range of available options and return once a valid number has been chosen
      Parameters:
      begin - The starting number
      numChoices - The total number of available options
      Returns:
      The first valid number chosen

    • viewAvailableAnimals

      public static void viewAvailableAnimals​(java.util.ArrayList<Animal> availableAnimals)
      Prints out all of the animals available for the farm
      Parameters:
      availableAnimals - A list of the animals available to be bought

    • viewCrops

      public static void viewCrops​(java.util.ArrayList<Crop> crops, boolean needsIndexes, boolean detailed)
      Prints out all currently owned crops
      Parameters:
      crops - The list of crops to be shown
      needsIndexes - true if the crops need to be numbered (i.e. when the player needs to choose from them), false if read-only
      detailed - true if timeGrowing needs to be shown (i.e. in the farm status), false when it is hidden (i.e. in the store/in the inventory)

    • viewAnimals

      public static void viewAnimals​(java.util.ArrayList<Animal> animals, boolean needsIndexes, boolean detailed)
      Prints out all currently owned animals
      Parameters:
      animals - The list of animals to be shown
      needsIndexes - true if the animals need to be numbered (i.e. when the player needs to choose from them), false if read-only
      detailed - true if healthiness and happiness need to be shown (i.e. in the farm status), false when it is hidden (i.e. in the store/in the inventory)

    • viewCropsInventory

      public static void viewCropsInventory​(java.util.ArrayList<Crop> cropsList, java.util.ArrayList<Crop> cropsSet)
      Prints out all currently owned crops with amounts
      Parameters:
      cropsList - A list of the currently owned crops
      cropsSet - A list of the currently owned crops without duplicates

    • viewAnimalsInventory

      public static void viewAnimalsInventory​(java.util.ArrayList<Animal> animalsList, java.util.ArrayList<Animal> animalsSet)
      Prints out all currently owned animals with amounts
      Parameters:
      animalsList - A list of the currently owned animals
      animalsSet - A list of the currently owned animals without duplicates

    • viewCropItems

      public static void viewCropItems​(java.util.ArrayList<CropItem> cropItems, java.util.ArrayList<CropItem> cropItemsSet, boolean needsIndexes)
      Prints out all owned crop items
      Parameters:
      cropItems - A list of the currently owned crop items
      cropItemsSet - A list of the currently owned crop items without duplicates
      needsIndexes - true if the items need to be numbered (i.e. when the player needs to choose from them), false if read-only

    • viewFoodItems

      public static void viewFoodItems​(java.util.ArrayList<FoodItem> foodItems, java.util.ArrayList<FoodItem> foodItemsSet, boolean needsIndexes)
      Prints out all owned food items
      Parameters:
      foodItems - A list of the currently owned food items
      foodItemsSet - A list of the currently owned food items without duplicates
      needsIndexes - true if the items need to be numbered (i.e. when the player needs to choose from them), false if read-only
